title: FedEx: the update
author: VD
content_html:
The packages arrived today. Sure enough, the correct address and all of the required information was clearly written on the label. However, there was a printout of the information that had showed up in the system, complete with the nonexistent shipper and the nonexistent destination. As Spacebunny suspected, no one ever bothered to check what was actually on the label.

Nevertheless, Reason triumphed over Bureaucratic Madness.
content_text:
The packages arrived today.  Sure enough, the correct address and all of the required information was clearly written on the label.  However, there was a printout of the information that had showed up in the system, complete with the nonexistent shipper and the nonexistent destination.  As Spacebunny suspected, no one ever bothered to check what was actually on the label.
Nevertheless, Reason triumphed over Bureaucratic Madness.
